0.text: Innate: Periodically, Malzahar gains Void Shift until he takes non- minion damage or negates a  crowd control effect, to which it then lingers for 0.25 seconds before expiring. Void Shift: Malzahar gains  crowd control immunity and 90%  damage reduction.
0.html:
Innate: Periodically, Malzahar gains Void Shift until he takes non- minion damage or negates a crowd control effect, to which it then lingers for 0.25 seconds before expiring.

Void Shift: Malzahar gains crowd control immunity and 90% damage reduction.
markedPassages: minion
crowd control
crowd control immunity
damage reduction

1.text: Void Shift's  cooldown refreshes whenever Malzahar takes non- minion damage or is affected by a  crowd control effect, and resets upon respawning.
1.html: Void Shift's  cooldown refreshes whenever Malzahar takes non- minion damage or is affected by a crowd control effect, and resets upon respawning.
markedPassages: cooldown
minion
crowd control

0.text: Active: Malzahar opens two portals to the void at the target location perpendicular to his facing, granting  sight of the area in between. After 0.4 seconds, enemies between the portals are dealt magic damage and  silenced for a duration.
0.html: Active: Malzahar opens two portals to the void at the target location perpendicular to his facing, granting sight of the area in between. After 0.4 seconds, enemies between the portals are dealt magic damage and silenced for a duration.
markedPassages: sight
silenced

0.text: Passive: Malzahar generates a stack of Zz'Rot Swarm when he casts another ability, up to a maximum of 2.
0.html: Passive: Malzahar generates a stack of Zz'Rot Swarm when he casts another ability, up to a maximum of 2.

1.text: Active: Malzahar consumes all Zz'Rot Swarm stacks and, after a 0.5-second delay, summons a  Voidling at the target location. Additional Voidlings are then summoned for each Zz'Rot Swarm stack consumed.
1.html: Active: Malzahar consumes all Zz'Rot Swarm stacks and, after a 0.5-second delay, summons a Voidling at the target location. Additional Voidlings are then summoned for each Zz'Rot Swarm stack consumed.
markedPassages: Voidling

2.text: Voidlings deal magic damage with their attacks. Voidlings deal 50% reduced damage to epic monsters and 200% increased damage to enemy  minions infected by  Malefic Visions.
2.html: Voidlings deal magic damage with their attacks. Voidlings deal 50% reduced damage to epic monsters and 200% increased damage to enemy minions infected by Malefic Visions.
markedPassages: minions
Malefic Visions

3.text: See Pets for more details about Voidlings.
3.html: See Pets for more details about Voidlings.

0.text: Active: Malzahar infects the target enemy's mind, dealing magic damage every 0.5 seconds over 4 seconds, which refreshes upon damaging them with  Call of the Void or  Nether Grasp.
0.html: Active: Malzahar infects the target enemy's mind, dealing magic damage every 0.5 seconds over 4 seconds, which refreshes upon damaging them with Call of the Void or Nether Grasp.
markedPassages: Call of the Void
Nether Grasp

1.text: If the target dies while infected, they spread Malefic Visions onto the closest nearby enemy and Malzahar restores  2% of his maximum mana.
1.html: If the target dies while infected, they spread Malefic Visions onto the closest nearby enemy and Malzahar restores  2% of his maximum mana.
markedPassages: 2% of his maximum mana

0.text: Active: Malzahar  tethers to the target enemy champion,  knocking them down. He then  channels for up to 2.5 seconds,  suppressing and  revealing the target and dealing them magic damage every 0.25 seconds,  revealing himself in the process.
0.html: Active: Malzahar tethers to the target enemy champion, knocking them down. He then channels for up to 2.5 seconds, suppressing and revealing the target and dealing them magic damage every 0.25 seconds, revealing himself in the process.
markedPassages: tethers
knocking them down
channels
suppressing
revealing
revealing

1.text: Malzahar will continue to channel as long as the tether is not broken, even if the suppression is removed.
1.html: Malzahar will continue to channel as long as the tether is not broken, even if the suppression is removed.

2.text: Additionally, a Null Zone is opened beneath the target's location at the time of cast that lasts 5 seconds, dealing magic damage every 0.5 seconds to enemies within, capped at 120 per tick against  minions and  monsters.
2.html: Additionally, a Null Zone is opened beneath the target's location at the time of cast that lasts 5 seconds, dealing magic damage every 0.5 seconds to enemies within, capped at 120 per tick against minions and monsters.

0.content: 10 / 15 / 20% (+ 2.5% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health

1.content: 1 / 1.5 / 2% (+ 0.25% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health

markedPassages: minions
monsters
10 / 15 / 20% (+ 2.5% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health
10 / 15 / 20% (+ 2.5% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health
1 / 1.5 / 2% (+ 0.25% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health
1 / 1.5 / 2% (+ 0.25% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health

3.text: Null Zone will persist even if the channel is interrupted.
3.html: Null Zone will persist even if the channel is interrupted.

Active: Malzahar consumes all Zz'Rot Swarm stacks and, after a 0.5-second delay, summons a  Voidling at the target location. Additional Voidlings are then summoned for each Zz'Rot Swarm stack consumed.
